warning: ⚠️ TIME IS CRITICAL: Most appeals must be filed within 7-14 days. Do not delay seeking help.

appeal.title: File Appeal Immediately
appeal.note: You usually have only 7-14 days to appeal the decision

legal.title: Get Legal Assistance
legal.note: Contact a lawyer or NGO specializing in asylum law immediately

documents.title: Gather All Documents
documents.note: Collect all papers related to your case and rejection notice

evidence.title: New Evidence
evidence.note: Any new proof about your situation that wasn't considered before

medical.title: Medical Documentation
medical.note: Medical reports that support your case, especially for trauma or health issues

witnesses.title: Witness Statements
witnesses.note: Letters from people who can confirm your story or situation
